mapper.select:
SELECT FROM posts JOIN users ON posts.author = users.id
LEFT JOIN postLikes ON posts.id = postLikes.post AND #{loginUser} = postLikes.userId
WHERE posts.id = #{id} AND posts.isDeleted = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts(id, text, author, image) VALUES (#{postId}, #{text}, #{loginUser}, #{image})
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET text = #{text}, lastEditDate = SYSDATE WHERE id = #{post}
UPDATE posts SET image = #{image}, lastEditDate = SYSDATE WHERE id = #{post}
UPDATE posts SET isDeleted = 'Y', image = NULL WHERE id = #{post}
